title: Strength of the Warrior
description: Strength of the Warrior is the first story in a romantic erotic, fantasy novel. Robear is the mighty warrior who only purpose in life was trying to find ways in being strong. He has many battles in his life, where he always was victorious until the day in one of his quest he met Tula the fair princess warrior who capture his heart this day. Robear heart is only for her, where he gave her a precious gem from the castle of the evil sorceress Selene who is an outrage by this and vows revenge on them for taking what is her. Robear meets others with noble hearts who agree to help him to rid this fair land of Sami of Selene, and along the way they became a family out of love they hold in them.
author: Robert Nacke
